title: A1: Init repo & dev stack
body:
Init repo, Makefile, docker-compose.dev.yml (Postgres+MinIO+app).

Implement XIDMixin & TimeMixin (immutable created_at).
Schemas: Game, File, Image, UserShadow, Report, ModerationAction, SiteSetting.

Generic S3 client; presign GET/PUT; env-driven.
